name: Health Empowerment & Access Team (HEAT)
description: The Health Empowerment & Access Team is dedicated to empowering individuals and improving health outcomes for people with substance use and/or mental health concerns, many of whom are homeless or marginally housed. We provide comprehensive services, including health access, linkage to primary care, detox and treatment services, and Medications for Opioid Use Disorder (MOUD). We also offer overdose prevention, access to syringes, Narcan, and clean use supplies, linkage to HIV/HCV treatment, harm
